text:
So true! Noticed a lot of clients want to go out of HubSpot, because they have 45 themes, 167 modules over time and cleaning that - I dont even know where to start.
Sandbox should be better, or API to send *(sandbox) Page1* _into_ *(live) Page1* 
• this would save so much manual work for users

Reminder: Friendly reminder - <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Ideas/ct-p/ideas|submit your ideas to the idea forum> and post the link here with your idea. The votes for a feature help HubSpotters understand the demand. Thank you for all of your awesome ideas and feedback, we are listening and appreciate it.

Maybe my sites aren't as complex or what. But I've never had an issue with staging. 

I just build all my pages inside of content staging using a new theme. I can test everything there, and when it's ready I press the button and it's live on the domain. 

I'm curious where you guys are running into issues.
